text: I had the same problem (building python2.5 from source on Ubuntu Lucid), and import sqlite3 threw this same exception.
I've installed libsqlite3-dev from the package manager, recompiled python2.5, and then the import worked.
My _sqlite3.so is in /usr/lib/python2.5/lib-dynload/_sqlite3.so.
